snippet.title: Curvature - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The official gameplay trailer for the upcoming soulslike game Curvature.

Take control of a highly adaptable battle machine and infiltrate a hostile civilization to keep peace in the universe. Build your own playstyle with a vast amount of gadgets, weapons and unique abilities. Survive and dominate a harsh and atmospheric world.

Wishlist and play the demo on: https://s.team/a/2068850

Join the official discord: https://discord.gg/9T3rK43G

Follow the game on: https://twitter.com/CurvatureGame

Trailer and game by Pawel Lossew

#soulslike made in #godot
